description:
131072 (weird name, huh) is currently a prototype of a survival game where weird things can happen to you. Right now, you can only walk around, and do nothing. The reason I am uploading this is to gain a little bit of attention when i get the game released. If you like the game, please look forward for future updates. (And yes, it is meant to be pixellated)

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD to move

Mouse to look

RIGHT CLICK to place

LEFT CLICK to break

R to rotate log (Before its placed, so you place it either on its side or standing)

I think thats all :P
